law.text: The amount payable to meet the Commonwealth's obligation as an employer under this chapter shall be paid from the general fund of the state or such other administrative funds as might properly be designated by the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet or successor thereto.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 19, effective July 1, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(2); and ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(23), (31). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 21.
